    ex) 800ì›ì„ 500ì›,400ì›,100ì› ìœ¼ë¡œëŠ” ìµœì†Ÿê°’ì´ ê²¹ì¹œë‹¤

    n,k = map(int, input().split())
coin_list = list()

for i in range(n):
    coin_list.append(int(input()))

count = 0 

for i in reversed(range(n)):
    count += k // coin_list[i]
    k = k % coin_list[i]

print(count)
